content: let friends and family admire your knitting know-how this holiday season with the tiny holiday sweater ornament perfect for decking the halls or trimming the tree this wee sweater features a fun cable on both the front and back sides along with a sophisticated turtleneck collar a perfectly pint-sized sweater the tiny holiday sweater ornament also doubles as a gift card holder and allows you add a personal touch to your gift knit from the bottom up with simple raglan shaping this miniature sweater is sure to warm up every knitter s holiday season
